title: fwf-helmuth
description: Comparison of US wheat yield with middle-aged marriages in Salzburg

dataset.title: Salzburg middle-aged marriages
dataset.data_quality_assurance:
Zenodo as read only repository guarantees, that no further changes will occur to the dataset and the processing algorithms.
Quality and Consistency of the collected data cannot be further investigated, as only re-use the data from Land Salzburg and US Argricultural Department, which do not specify how their data is collected and quality assured.

distribution.title: Salzburg middle-aged marriages
distribution.description:
Sharing Conditions: Data will be available via Zenodo without any limitations
Versioning Strategy: no versioning
Reuse: Everyone interested in marriage patterns of Salzburg citizens
Structure: number of husbands and wives, per age group within a given year, husbands had to be registered in Salzburg
Number of Files: 1

dataset.description:
structured relational data
Interoperability: no
Creation methods: Land Salzburg registers all marriages in its area
Metadata: CSV file will be acessable, interoperable and re-usable for a long time, Findability is guaranteed by Zenodo.

dataset.title: US wheat yield

distribution.title: US wheat yield
distribution.description:
Sharing Conditions: Data will be available via Zenodo without any limitations
Versioning Strategy: no versioning
Reuse: Everyone interested in US wheat output
Structure: acres used, yearly production, yield (production per acre) for wheat per year in the US
Number of Files: 1

dataset.description:
structured relational data
Creation methods: US Department of Agriculture, collects this data by counting and summing the farmers data nationwide.
Metadata: Acessability, interoperability and re-usability is limited since the use of XLS file format. Findability is guaranteed by Zenodo.

dataset.title: Combined

distribution.title: Combined
distribution.description:
Sharing Conditions: Data will be available via Zenodo without any limitations
Versioning Strategy: no versioning
Reuse: Everyone interested in correlation between Salzburg middle-age marriages and US wheat yield
Structure: Dataset contains year, number of spouses, gender, a_p (acres planted), a_h (acres harvested), production, yield, p (pearson correlation)
Number of Files: 1

dataset.description:
structured relational data
Creation methods: processed combination of "Salzburg middle-aged marriages" dataset and "US wheat yield" dataset
Metadata: CSV file will be acessable, interoperable and re-usable for a long time, Findability is guaranteed by Zenodo.
